price: Allah’ın kadrini gereği gibi bilemediler. Şüphesiz Allah kuvvetlidir, mutlak güç sahibidir.
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
